input.sentences: i had a great time at the award ceremony .
there were a lot of recipients .
we all got together for group pictures .

output.sentences: The time had arrived, and everyone excitedly awaited the award ceremony.
The reward recipients expressed a lot of gratitude!
The group posed for pictures afterward.
Everyone met a lot of new people.
All in all, the day was tons of fun!
